text:
Michael Jenkins Crouch (27 May 1933 – 9 February 2018) was an Australian businessman. He was born in Sydney. He served as Chairman of the private company Midgeon Holdings Pty Ltd. Until December 2013 he was also Executive Chairman of Zip Industries, a manufacturing company he founded following his acquisition in 1962 of Zip Heaters.
Crouch died in Sydney of complications from Parkinson's disease on 9 February 2018 at the age of 84.
